thread.title: Stamford Bridge opens up exclusive Directors Lounge for corporate events
thread.title_full: Stamford Bridge opens up exclusive Directors Lounge for corporate events

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Stamford Bridge opens up exclusive Directors Lounge for corporate events
text:
Stamford Bridge opens up exclusive Directors Lounge for corporate events Stamford Bridge opens up exclusive Directors Lounge for corporate events Details Category: Venues & Events   16:30 Previously reserved exclusively for senior club guests on a matchday, the Directors Lounge is now available to hire for private dinners and drink receptions for the first time in club history. 
Offering an unforgettable backdrop to any event the lounge features: • A velvet banquette-seated reception area, six mirror-topped dinner tables and Chelsea FC’s prized trophy collection • Exclusive access to the Directors terrace with stunning views of the pitch • Package options of a drinks reception for up to 150 guests at £100+VAT pp or dining experience for up to 48 guests at £180+VAT pp • Drinks Reception includes a two-hours drinks reception of Champagne, house wines and beer and five canapés per person • The Dining package includes a 30 minute Champagne and canapé reception, three-course fine-dining menu, hot drinks and complimentary bar of house wine, beer, spirits and soft drinks for four hours • Catering is provided by award-winning in-house caterers Levy Restaurants Related articles
